task.title: How to Multiply Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find steps showing how to use the multiply feature on the JPS calculator app

prereq.p: To successfully multiply numbers, you must first understand the concept of multiplication.

taskbody.result: The multiplication result will be displayed.
taskbody.example: You want to multiply 2 times 7. The equation will appear as 2 * 7 = 14. Enter the number 2. Press the multiply symbol (*). Enter 7. Then, press the equality symbol (=).The result will appear on the screen.
